ACCEPT_HANDOVER.name: ACCEPT_HANDOVER
ACCEPT_HANDOVER.description: Allows a calling app to continue a call which was started in another app.
ACCEPT_HANDOVER.explanation: An example is a video calling app that wants to continue a voice call on the user's mobile network.

ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION.name: ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION
ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION.description: Allows an app to access location in the background.
ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION.explanation: If you're requesting this permission, you must also request either ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION. Requesting this permission by itself doesn't give you location access.

ACCESS_BLOBS_ACROSS_USERS.name: ACCESS_BLOBS_ACROSS_USERS
ACCESS_BLOBS_ACROSS_USERS.description: Allows an application to access data blobs across users.

ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES.name: ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES.description: Allows read/write access to the "properties" table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.

ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.name: ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.description: Allows an app to access approximate location.
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.explanation: Alternatively, you might want ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.

ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.name: ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Allows an app to access precise location.
ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.explanation: Alternatively, you might want ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.

ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS.name: ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS.description: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands.

ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION.name: ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION
ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION.description: Allows an application to access any geographic locations persisted in the user's shared collection.

ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.name: ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows applications to access information about networks.

ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY.name: ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY
ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY.description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.
ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY.explanation: This permission is not supported on managed profiles.

ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.name: ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.

ACCOUNT_MANAGER.name: ACCOUNT_MANAGER
ACCOUNT_MANAGER.description: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.

ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION.name: ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION
ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION.description: Allows an application to recognize physical activity.

ADD_VOICEMAIL.name: ADD_VOICEMAIL
ADD_VOICEMAIL.description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS.name: ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS
ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS.description: Allows the app to answer an incoming phone call.

BATTERY_STATS.name: BATTERY_STATS
BATTERY_STATS.description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics

BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE.name: BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE.description: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_APPWIDGET.name: BIND_APPWIDGET
BIND_APPWIDGET.description: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data.
BIND_APPWIDGET.explanation: The normal user flow is that a user picks an AppWidget to go into a particular host, thereby giving that host application access to the private data from the AppWidget app. An application that has this permission should honor that contract.

BIND_AUTOFILL_SERVICE.name: BIND_AUTOFILL_SERVICE
BIND_AUTOFILL_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a AutofillService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_AUTOFILL_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a AutofillService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_CALL_REDIRECTION_SERVICE.name: BIND_CALL_REDIRECTION_SERVICE
BIND_CALL_REDIRECTION_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a CallRedirectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_CALL_REDIRECTION_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a CallRedirectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_CLIENT_SERVICE.name: BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_CLIENT_SERVICE
BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_CLIENT_SERVICE.description: A subclass of CarrierMessagingClientService must be protected with this permission.
BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_CLIENT_SERVICE.explanation: A subclass of CarrierMessagingClientService must be protected with this permission.

BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE.name: BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE
BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 23. Use BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES instead

BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES.name: BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES
BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES.description: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission.
BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES.explanation: Carrier apps should use this permission to protect their services that only the system is allowed to bind to.

BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE.name: BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE
BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 30. For publishing direct share targets, please follow the instructions in https://developer.android.com/training/sharing/receive.html#providing-direct-share-targets instead.

BIND_COMPANION_DEVICE_SERVICE.name: BIND_COMPANION_DEVICE_SERVICE
BIND_COMPANION_DEVICE_SERVICE.description: Must be required by any CompanionDeviceServices to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_COMPANION_DEVICE_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by any CompanionDeviceServices to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE.name: BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE
BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a ConditionProviderService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a ConditionProviderService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_CONTROLS.name: BIND_CONTROLS
BIND_CONTROLS.description: Allows SystemUI to request third party controls.

BIND_CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_SERVICE.name: BIND_CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_SERVICE
BIND_CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a CredentialProviderService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.name: BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.description: Must be required by device administration receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.

BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.name: BIND_DREAM_SERVICE
BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.description: Must be required by an DreamService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by an DreamService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.name: BIND_INCALL_SERVICE
BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a InCallService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a InCallService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_INPUT_METHOD.name: BIND_INPUT_METHOD
BIND_INPUT_METHOD.description: Must be required by an InputMethodService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_INPUT_METHOD.explanation: Must be required by an InputMethodService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE.name: BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE
BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE.description: Must be required by an MidiDeviceService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by an MidiDeviceService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_NFC_SERVICE.name: BIND_NFC_SERVICE
BIND_NFC_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_NFC_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE.name: BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE.description: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.name: BIND_PRINT_SERVICE
BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_QUICK_ACCESS_WALLET_SERVICE.name: BIND_QUICK_ACCESS_WALLET_SERVICE
BIND_QUICK_ACCESS_WALLET_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a QuickAccessWalletService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_QUICK_ACCESS_WALLET_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a QuickAccessWalletService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE.name: BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE
BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE.description: Allows an application to bind to third party quick settings tiles.

BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.name: BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.description: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.explanation: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE.name: BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE
BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a CallScreeningService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a CallScreeningService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE.name: BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE
BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a ConnectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a ConnectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.name: BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a TextService (e.g.
BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.explanation: SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_TV_INPUT.name: BIND_TV_INPUT
BIND_TV_INPUT.description: Must be required by a TvInputService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_TV_INPUT.explanation: Must be required by a TvInputService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_TV_INTERACTIVE_APP.name: BIND_TV_INTERACTIVE_APP
BIND_TV_INTERACTIVE_APP.description: Must be required by a TvInteractiveAppService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_TV_INTERACTIVE_APP.explanation: Must be required by a TvInteractiveAppService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_VISUAL_VOICEMAIL_SERVICE.name: BIND_VISUAL_VOICEMAIL_SERVICE
BIND_VISUAL_VOICEMAIL_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a link VisualVoicemailService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_VISUAL_VOICEMAIL_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a link VisualVoicemailService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION.name: BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION
BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION.description: Must be required by a VoiceInteractionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION.explanation: Must be required by a VoiceInteractionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_VPN_SERVICE.name: BIND_VPN_SERVICE
BIND_VPN_SERVICE.description: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_VPN_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE.name: BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE
BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE.description: Must be required by an VrListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE.explanation: Must be required by an VrListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BIND_WALLPAPER.name: BIND_WALLPAPER
BIND_WALLPAPER.description: Must be required by a WallpaperService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
BIND_WALLPAPER.explanation: Must be required by a WallpaperService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

BLUETOOTH.name: BLUETOOTH
BLUETOOTH.description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.

BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.name: BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices.

BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE.name: BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE
BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE.description: Required to be able to advertise to nearby Bluetooth devices.

BLUETOOTH_CONNECT.name: BLUETOOTH_CONNECT
BLUETOOTH_CONNECT.description: Required to be able to connect to paired Bluetooth devices.

BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.name: BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED
BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.description: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction, and to allow or disallow phonebook access or message access.

BLUETOOTH_SCAN.name: BLUETOOTH_SCAN
BLUETOOTH_SCAN.description: Required to be able to discover and pair nearby Bluetooth devices.

BODY_SENSORS.name: BODY_SENSORS
BODY_SENSORS.description: Allows an application to access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside their body, such as heart rate.

BODY_SENSORS_BACKGROUND.name: BODY_SENSORS_BACKGROUND
BODY_SENSORS_BACKGROUND.description: Allows an application to access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside their body, such as heart rate.
BODY_SENSORS_BACKGROUND.explanation: If you're requesting this permission, you must also request BODY_SENSORS. Requesting this permission by itself doesn't give you Body sensors access.

BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED.name: BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED.description: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.

BROADCAST_SMS.name: BROADCAST_SMS
BROADCAST_SMS.description: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.

BROADCAST_STICKY.name: BROADCAST_STICKY
BROADCAST_STICKY.description: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents.
BROADCAST_STICKY.explanation: These are broadcasts whose data is held by the system after being finished, so that clients can quickly retrieve that data without having to wait for the next broadcast.

BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.name: BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.description: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.

CALL_COMPANION_APP.name: CALL_COMPANION_APP
CALL_COMPANION_APP.description: Allows an app which implements the InCallService API to be eligible to be enabled as a calling companion app.
CALL_COMPANION_APP.explanation: Allows an app which implements the InCallService API to be eligible to be enabled as a calling companion app. This means that the Telecom framework will bind to the app's InCallService implementation when there are calls active. The app can use the InCallService API to view information about calls on the system and control these calls.

CALL_PHONE.name: CALL_PHONE
CALL_PHONE.description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.

CALL_PRIVILEGED.name: CALL_PRIVILEGED
CALL_PRIVILEGED.description: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

CAMERA.name: CAMERA
CAMERA.description: Required to be able to access the camera device.

CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.name: CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT
CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.description: Allows an application to capture audio output.
CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.explanation: Use the CAPTURE_MEDIA_OUTPUT permission if only the USAGE_UNKNOWN), USAGE_MEDIA) or USAGE_GAME) usages are intended to be captured.

CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE.name: CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE.description: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.

CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.name: CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.description: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.

CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.name: CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state.

CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE.name: CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE.description: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode.

CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.name: CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.

CLEAR_APP_CACHE.name: CLEAR_APP_CACHE
CLEAR_APP_CACHE.description: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.

CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY.name: CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY
CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY.description: Allows an application to configure and connect to Wifi displays

CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES.name: CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES.description: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.

CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_QUERY_CANDIDATE_CREDE.name: CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_QUERY_CANDIDATE_CREDENTIALS
CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_QUERY_CANDIDATE_CREDE.description: Allows a browser to invoke the set of query apis to get metadata about credential candidates prepared during the CredentialManager.prepareGetCredential API.

CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ALLOWED_PROVIDERS.name: CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ALLOWED_PROVIDERS
CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ALLOWED_PROVIDERS.description: Allows specifying candidate credential providers to be queried in Credential Manager get flows, or to be preferred as a default in the Credential Manager create flows.

CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ORIGIN.name: CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ORIGIN
CREDENTIAL_MANAGER_SET_ORIGIN.description: Allows a browser to invoke credential manager APIs on behalf of another RP.

DELETE_CACHE_FILES.name: DELETE_CACHE_FILES
DELETE_CACHE_FILES.description: Old permission for deleting an app's cache files, no longer used, but signals for us to quietly ignore calls instead of throwing an exception.

DELETE_PACKAGES.name: DELETE_PACKAGES
DELETE_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to delete packages.

DELIVER_COMPANION_MESSAGES.name: DELIVER_COMPANION_MESSAGES
DELIVER_COMPANION_MESSAGES.description: Allows an application to deliver companion messages to system

DETECT_SCREEN_CAPTURE.name: DETECT_SCREEN_CAPTURE
DETECT_SCREEN_CAPTURE.description: Allows an application to get notified when a screen capture of its windows is attempted.

DIAGNOSTIC.name: DIAGNOSTIC
DIAGNOSTIC.description: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.

DISABLE_KEYGUARD.name: DISABLE_KEYGUARD
DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description: Allows applications to disable the keyguard if it is not secure.

DUMP.name: DUMP
DUMP.description: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.

ENFORCE_UPDATE_OWNERSHIP.name: ENFORCE_UPDATE_OWNERSHIP
ENFORCE_UPDATE_OWNERSHIP.description: Allows an application to indicate via PackageInstaller.SessionParams.setRequestUpdateOwnership(boolean) that it has the intention of becoming the update owner.
ENFORCE_UPDATE_OWNERSHIP.explanation: Allows an application to indicate via PackageInstaller.SessionParams.setRequestUpdateOwnership(boolean) that it has the intention of becoming the update owner.

EXECUTE_APP_ACTION.name: EXECUTE_APP_ACTION
EXECUTE_APP_ACTION.description: Allows an assistive application to perform actions on behalf of users inside of applications.

EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.name: EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.

FACTORY_TEST.name: FACTORY_TEST
FACTORY_TEST.description: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user.
FACTORY_TEST.explanation: Only available when the device is running in manufacturer test mode.

FOREGROUND_SERVICE.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE
FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground.
FOREGROUND_SERVICE.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground.

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CAMERA.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CAMERA
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CAMERA.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "camera".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CAMERA.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "camera".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CONNECTED_DEVICE.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CONNECTED_DEVICE
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CONNECTED_DEVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "connectedDevice".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_CONNECTED_DEVICE.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "connectedDevice".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "dataSync".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "dataSync".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_HEALTH.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_HEALTH
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_HEALTH.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "health".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_HEALTH.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "health".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_LOCATION.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_LOCATION
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_LOCATION.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "location".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_LOCATION.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "location".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PLAYBACK.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PLAYBACK
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PLAYBACK.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "mediaPlayback".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PLAYBACK.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "mediaPlayback".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PROJECTION.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PROJECTION
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PROJECTION.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "mediaProjection".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MEDIA_PROJECTION.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "mediaProjection".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MICROPHONE.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MICROPHONE
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MICROPHONE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "microphone".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_MICROPHONE.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "microphone".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_PHONE_CALL.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_PHONE_CALL
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_PHONE_CALL.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "phoneCall".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_PHONE_CALL.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "phoneCall".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_REMOTE_MESSAGING.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_REMOTE_MESSAGING
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_REMOTE_MESSAGING.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "remoteMessaging".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_REMOTE_MESSAGING.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "remoteMessaging".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "specialUse".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "specialUse".

FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED.name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "systemExempted".
FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED.explanation: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground with the type "systemExempted". Apps are allowed to use this type only in the use cases listed in ServiceInfo.FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED.

GET_ACCOUNTS.name: GET_ACCOUNTS
GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.

GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED.name: GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED
GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED.description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.

GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.name: GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.description: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.

GET_TASKS.name: GET_TASKS
GET_TASKS.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 21. No longer enforced.

GLOBAL_SEARCH.name: GLOBAL_SEARCH
GLOBAL_SEARCH.description: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data.
GLOBAL_SEARCH.explanation: Typically it used when the provider has some permissions protecting it (which global search would not be expected to hold), and added as a read-only permission to the path in the provider where global search queries are performed. This permission can not be held by regular applications; it is used by applications to protect themselves from everyone else besides global search.

HIDE_OVERLAY_WINDOWS.name: HIDE_OVERLAY_WINDOWS
HIDE_OVERLAY_WINDOWS.description: Allows an app to prevent non-system-overlay windows from being drawn on top of it

HIGH_SAMPLING_RATE_SENSORS.name: HIGH_SAMPLING_RATE_SENSORS
HIGH_SAMPLING_RATE_SENSORS.description: Allows an app to access sensor data with a sampling rate greater than 200 Hz.

INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER.name: INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER.description: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.

INSTALL_PACKAGES.name: INSTALL_PACKAGES
INSTALL_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to install packages.

INSTALL_SHORTCUT.name: INSTALL_SHORTCUT
INSTALL_SHORTCUT.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

INSTANT_APP_FOREGROUND_SERVICE.name: INSTANT_APP_FOREGROUND_SERVICE
INSTANT_APP_FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows an instant app to create foreground services.

INTERACT_ACROSS_PROFILES.name: INTERACT_ACROSS_PROFILES
INTERACT_ACROSS_PROFILES.description: Allows interaction across profiles in the same profile group.

INTERNET.name: INTERNET
INTERNET.description: Allows applications to open network sockets.

KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES.name: KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES.explanation: Allows an application to call ActivityManager.killBackgroundProcesses(String).

LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE.name: LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE
LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE.description: Allows an application to capture screen content to perform a screenshot using the intent action Intent.ACTION_LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE.
LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE.explanation: Allows an application to capture screen content to perform a screenshot using the intent action Intent.ACTION_LAUNCH_CAPTURE_CONTENT_ACTIVITY_FOR_NOTE.

LAUNCH_MULTI_PANE_SETTINGS_DEEP_LINK.name: LAUNCH_MULTI_PANE_SETTINGS_DEEP_LINK
LAUNCH_MULTI_PANE_SETTINGS_DEEP_LINK.description: An application needs this permission for Settings.ACTION_SETTINGS_EMBED_DEEP_LINK_ACTIVITY to show its Activity embedded in Settings app.
LAUNCH_MULTI_PANE_SETTINGS_DEEP_LINK.explanation: An application needs this permission for Settings.ACTION_SETTINGS_EMBED_DEEP_LINK_ACTIVITY to show its Activity embedded in Settings app.

LOADER_USAGE_STATS.name: LOADER_USAGE_STATS
LOADER_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows a data loader to read a package's access logs.
LOADER_USAGE_STATS.explanation: The access logs contain the set of pages referenced over time.

LOCATION_HARDWARE.name: LOCATION_HARDWARE
LOCATION_HARDWARE.description: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.

MANAGE_DEVICE_LOCK_STATE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_LOCK_STATE
MANAGE_DEVICE_LOCK_STATE.description: Allows financed device kiosk apps to perform actions on the Device Lock service

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCESSIBILITY.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCESSIBILITY
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCESSIBILITY.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to accessibility.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT.description: Allows an application to set policy related to account management.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS.description: Allows an application to set device policies outside the current user that are required for securing device ownership without accessing user data.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_FULL.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_FULL
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_FULL.description: Allows an application to set device policies outside the current user.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_SECURI.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_SECURITY_CRITICAL
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ACROSS_USERS_SECURI.description: Allows an application to set device policies outside the current user that are critical for securing data within the current user.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AIRPLANE_MODE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AIRPLANE_MODE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AIRPLANE_MODE.description: Allows an application to set policy related to airplane mode.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APPS_CONTROL.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APPS_CONTROL
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APPS_CONTROL.description: Allows an application to manage policy regarding modifying applications.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_RESTRICTIONS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_RESTRICTIONS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_RESTRICTIONS.description: Allows an application to manage application restrictions.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_USER_DATA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_USER_DATA
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_APP_USER_DATA.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to application user data.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUDIO_OUTPUT.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUDIO_OUTPUT
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUDIO_OUTPUT.description: Allows an application to set policy related to audio output.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUTOFILL.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUTOFILL
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_AUTOFILL.description: Allows an application to set policy related to autofill.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BACKUP_SERVICE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BACKUP_SERVICE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BACKUP_SERVICE.description: Allows an application to manage backup service policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BLUETOOTH.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BLUETOOTH
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to set policy related to bluetooth.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BUGREPORT.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BUGREPORT
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_BUGREPORT.description: Allows an application to request bugreports with user consent.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CALLS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CALLS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CALLS.description: Allows an application to manage calling policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CAMERA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CAMERA
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CAMERA.description: Allows an application to set policy related to restricting a user's ability to use or enable and disable the camera.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CERTIFICATES.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CERTIFICATES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_CERTIFICATES.description: Allows an application to set policy related to certificates.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_COMMON_CRITERIA_MOD.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_COMMON_CRITERIA_MODE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_COMMON_CRITERIA_MOD.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to common criteria mode.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEBUGGING_FEATURES.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEBUGGING_FEATURES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEBUGGING_FEATURES.description: Allows an application to manage debugging features policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEFAULT_SMS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEFAULT_SMS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEFAULT_SMS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to the default sms application.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEVICE_IDENTIFIERS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEVICE_IDENTIFIERS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DEVICE_IDENTIFIERS.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to device identifiers.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DISPLAY.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DISPLAY
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_DISPLAY.description: Allows an application to set policy related to the display.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FACTORY_RESET.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FACTORY_RESET
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FACTORY_RESET.description: Allows an application to set policy related to factory reset.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FUN.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FUN
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_FUN.description: Allows an application to set policy related to fun.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INPUT_METHODS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INPUT_METHODS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INPUT_METHODS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to input methods.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INSTALL_UNKNOWN_SOU.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INSTALL_UNKNOWN_SOURCES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_INSTALL_UNKNOWN_SOU.description: Allows an application to manage installing from unknown sources policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEEP_UNINSTALLED_PA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEEP_UNINSTALLED_PACKAGES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEEP_UNINSTALLED_PA.description: Allows an application to set policy related to keeping uninstalled packages.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEYGUARD.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEYGUARD
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_KEYGUARD.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to keyguard.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCALE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCALE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCALE.description: Allows an application to set policy related to locale.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCATION.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCATION
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCATION.description: Allows an application to set policy related to location.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK.description: Allows an application to lock a profile or the device with the appropriate cross-user permission.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_CREDENTIALS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_CREDENTIALS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to lock credentials.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_TASK.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_TASK
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_LOCK_TASK.description: Allows an application to manage lock task policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_METERED_DATA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_METERED_DATA
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_METERED_DATA.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to metered data.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MICROPHONE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MICROPHONE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MICROPHONE.description: Allows an application to set policy related to restricting a user's ability to use or enable and disable the microphone.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MOBILE_NETWORK.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MOBILE_NETWORK
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MOBILE_NETWORK.description: Allows an application to set policy related to mobile networks.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MODIFY_USERS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MODIFY_USERS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MODIFY_USERS.description: Allows an application to manage policy preventing users from modifying users.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MTE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MTE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_MTE.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to the Memory Tagging Extension (MTE).

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NEARBY_COMMUNICATIO.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NEARBY_COMMUNICATION
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NEARBY_COMMUNICATIO.description: Allows an application to set policy related to nearby communications (e.g.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NETWORK_LOGGING.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NETWORK_LOGGING
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_NETWORK_LOGGING.description: Allows an application to set policy related to network logging.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ORGANIZATION_IDENTI.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ORGANIZATION_IDENTITY
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_ORGANIZATION_IDENTI.description: Allows an application to manage the identity of the managing organization.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_OVERRIDE_APN.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_OVERRIDE_APN
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_OVERRIDE_APN.description: Allows an application to set policy related to override APNs.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PACKAGE_STATE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PACKAGE_STATE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PACKAGE_STATE.description: Allows an application to set policy related to hiding and suspending packages.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PHYSICAL_MEDIA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PHYSICAL_MEDIA
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PHYSICAL_MEDIA.description: Allows an application to set policy related to physical media.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRINTING.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRINTING
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRINTING.description: Allows an application to set policy related to printing.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRIVATE_DNS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRIVATE_DNS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PRIVATE_DNS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to private DNS.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILES.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILES.description: Allows an application to set policy related to profiles.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILE_INTERACTION.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILE_INTERACTION
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROFILE_INTERACTION.description: Allows an application to set policy related to interacting with profiles (e.g.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROXY.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROXY
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_PROXY.description: Allows an application to set a network-independent global HTTP proxy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_QUERY_SYSTEM_UPDATE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_QUERY_SYSTEM_UPDATES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_QUERY_SYSTEM_UPDATE.description: Allows an application query system updates.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESET_PASSWORD.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESET_PASSWORD
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESET_PASSWORD.description: Allows an application to force set a new device unlock password or a managed profile challenge on current user.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESTRICT_PRIVATE_DN.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESTRICT_PRIVATE_DNS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RESTRICT_PRIVATE_DN.description: Allows an application to set policy related to restricting the user from configuring private DNS.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS.description: Allows an application to set the grant state of runtime permissions on packages.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND.description: Allows an application to set policy related to users running in the background.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SAFE_BOOT.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SAFE_BOOT
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SAFE_BOOT.description: Allows an application to manage safe boot policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CAPTURE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CAPTURE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CAPTURE.description: Allows an application to set policy related to screen capture.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CONTENT.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CONTENT
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SCREEN_CONTENT.description: Allows an application to set policy related to the usage of the contents of the screen.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SECURITY_LOGGING.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SECURITY_LOGGING
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SECURITY_LOGGING.description: Allows an application to set policy related to security logging.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SETTINGS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SETTINGS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to settings.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SMS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SMS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SMS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to sms.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_STATUS_BAR.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_STATUS_BAR
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows an application to set policy related to the status bar.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUPPORT_MESSAGE.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUPPORT_MESSAGE
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUPPORT_MESSAGE.description: Allows an application to set support messages for when a user action is affected by an active policy.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUSPEND_PERSONAL_AP.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUSPEND_PERSONAL_APPS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SUSPEND_PERSONAL_AP.description: Allows an application to set policy related to suspending personal apps.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_APPS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_APPS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_APPS.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to system apps.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_DIALOGS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_DIALOGS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_DIALOGS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to system dialogs.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_UPDATES.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_UPDATES
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_SYSTEM_UPDATES.description: Allows an application to set policy related to system updates.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_TIME.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_TIME
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_TIME.description: Allows an application to manage device policy relating to time.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_DATA_SIGNALLING.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_DATA_SIGNALLING
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_DATA_SIGNALLING.description: Allows an application to set policy related to usb data signalling.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_FILE_TRANSFER.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_FILE_TRANSFER
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USB_FILE_TRANSFER.description: Allows an application to set policy related to usb file transfers.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USERS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USERS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_USERS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to users.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_VPN.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_VPN
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_VPN.description: Allows an application to set policy related to VPNs.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WALLPAPER.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WALLPAPER
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WALLPAPER.description: Allows an application to set policy related to the wallpaper.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIFI.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIFI
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIFI.description: Allows an application to set policy related to Wifi.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WINDOWS.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WINDOWS
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WINDOWS.description: Allows an application to set policy related to windows.

MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIPE_DATA.name: MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIPE_DATA
MANAGE_DEVICE_POLICY_WIPE_DATA.description: Allows an application to manage policy related to wiping data.

MANAGE_DOCUMENTS.name: MANAGE_DOCUMENTS
MANAGE_DOCUMENTS.description: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.

MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.name: MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application a broad access to external storage in scoped storage.
MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.explanation: Intended to be used by few apps that need to manage files on behalf of the users.

MANAGE_MEDIA.name: MANAGE_MEDIA
MANAGE_MEDIA.description: Allows an application to modify and delete media files on this device or any connected storage device without user confirmation.
MANAGE_MEDIA.explanation: Applications must already be granted the READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE or MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE} permissions for this permission to take effect.

MANAGE_ONGOING_CALLS.name: MANAGE_ONGOING_CALLS
MANAGE_ONGOING_CALLS.description: Allows to query ongoing call details and manage ongoing calls

MANAGE_OWN_CALLS.name: MANAGE_OWN_CALLS
MANAGE_OWN_CALLS.description: Allows a calling application which manages its own calls through the self-managed ConnectionService APIs.
MANAGE_OWN_CALLS.explanation: Allows a calling application which manages its own calls through the self-managed ConnectionService APIs. See PhoneAccount.CAPABILITY_SELF_MANAGED for more information on the self-managed ConnectionService APIs.

MANAGE_WIFI_INTERFACES.name: MANAGE_WIFI_INTERFACES
MANAGE_WIFI_INTERFACES.description: Allows applications to get notified when a Wi-Fi interface request cannot be satisfied without tearing down one or more other interfaces, and provide a decision whether to approve the request or reject it.

MANAGE_WIFI_NETWORK_SELECTION.name: MANAGE_WIFI_NETWORK_SELECTION
MANAGE_WIFI_NETWORK_SELECTION.description: This permission is used to let OEMs grant their trusted app access to a subset of privileged wifi APIs to improve wifi performance.
MANAGE_WIFI_NETWORK_SELECTION.explanation: Allows applications to manage Wi-Fi network selection related features such as enable or disable global auto-join, modify connectivity scan intervals, and approve Wi-Fi Direct connections.

MASTER_CLEAR.name: MASTER_CLEAR
MASTER_CLEAR.description: Not for use by third-party applications.

MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.name: MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL
MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.description: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.

MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.name: MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify global audio settings.

MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.name: MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc.

MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS.name: MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS
MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS.description: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.

MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS.name: MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS
MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS.description: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.

NEARBY_WIFI_DEVICES.name: NEARBY_WIFI_DEVICES
NEARBY_WIFI_DEVICES.description: Required to be able to advertise and connect to nearby devices via Wi-Fi.

NFC.name: NFC
NFC.description: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC.

NFC_PREFERRED_PAYMENT_INFO.name: NFC_PREFERRED_PAYMENT_INFO
NFC_PREFERRED_PAYMENT_INFO.description: Allows applications to receive NFC preferred payment service information.

NFC_TRANSACTION_EVENT.name: NFC_TRANSACTION_EVENT
NFC_TRANSACTION_EVENT.description: Allows applications to receive NFC transaction events.

OVERRIDE_WIFI_CONFIG.name: OVERRIDE_WIFI_CONFIG
OVERRIDE_WIFI_CONFIG.description: Allows an application to modify any wifi configuration, even if created by another application.
OVERRIDE_WIFI_CONFIG.explanation: Once reconfigured the original creator cannot make any further modifications.

PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.name: PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows an application to collect component usage statistics

PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.name: PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY
PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 15. This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.

POST_NOTIFICATIONS.name: POST_NOTIFICATIONS
POST_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Allows an app to post notifications

PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS.name: PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 29. Applications should use CallRedirectionService instead of the Intent.ACTION_NEW_OUTGOING_CALL broadcast.

PROVIDE_OWN_AUTOFILL_SUGGESTIONS.name: PROVIDE_OWN_AUTOFILL_SUGGESTIONS
PROVIDE_OWN_AUTOFILL_SUGGESTIONS.description: Allows an application to display its suggestions using the autofill framework.

PROVIDE_REMOTE_CREDENTIALS.name: PROVIDE_REMOTE_CREDENTIALS
PROVIDE_REMOTE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to be able to store and retrieve credentials from a remote device.

QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES.name: QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES
QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES.description: Allows query of any normal app on the device, regardless of manifest declarations.

READ_ASSISTANT_APP_SEARCH_DATA.name: READ_ASSISTANT_APP_SEARCH_DATA
READ_ASSISTANT_APP_SEARCH_DATA.description: Allows an application to query over global data in AppSearch that's visible to the ASSISTANT role.

READ_BASIC_PHONE_STATE.name: READ_BASIC_PHONE_STATE
READ_BASIC_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows read only access to phone state with a non dangerous permission, including the information like cellular network type, software version.

READ_CALENDAR.name: READ_CALENDAR
READ_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.

READ_CALL_LOG.name: READ_CALL_LOG
READ_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

READ_CONTACTS.name: READ_CONTACTS
READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.name: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from external storage.

READ_HOME_APP_SEARCH_DATA.name: READ_HOME_APP_SEARCH_DATA
READ_HOME_APP_SEARCH_DATA.description: Allows an application to query over global data in AppSearch that's visible to the HOME role.

READ_INPUT_STATE.name: READ_INPUT_STATE
READ_INPUT_STATE.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 16. The API that used this permission has been removed.

READ_LOGS.name: READ_LOGS
READ_LOGS.description: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.

READ_MEDIA_AUDIO.name: READ_MEDIA_AUDIO
READ_MEDIA_AUDIO.description: Allows an application to read audio files from external storage.

READ_MEDIA_IMAGES.name: READ_MEDIA_IMAGES
READ_MEDIA_IMAGES.description: Allows an application to read image files from external storage.

READ_MEDIA_VIDEO.name: READ_MEDIA_VIDEO
READ_MEDIA_VIDEO.description: Allows an application to read video files from external storage.

READ_MEDIA_VISUAL_USER_SELECTED.name: READ_MEDIA_VISUAL_USER_SELECTED
READ_MEDIA_VISUAL_USER_SELECTED.description: Allows an application to read image or video files from external storage that a user has selected via the permission prompt photo picker.
READ_MEDIA_VISUAL_USER_SELECTED.explanation: Apps can check this permission to verify that a user has decided to use the photo picker, instead of granting access to READ_MEDIA_IMAGES or READ_MEDIA_VIDEO. It does not prevent apps from accessing the standard photo picker manually. This permission should be requested alongside READ_MEDIA_IMAGES and/or READ_MEDIA_VIDEO, depending on which type of media is desired.

READ_NEARBY_STREAMING_POLICY.name: READ_NEARBY_STREAMING_POLICY
READ_NEARBY_STREAMING_POLICY.description: Allows an application to read nearby streaming policy.
READ_NEARBY_STREAMING_POLICY.explanation: The policy controls whether to allow the device to stream its notifications and apps to nearby devices. Applications that are not the device owner will need this permission to call DevicePolicyManager.getNearbyNotificationStreamingPolicy() or DevicePolicyManager.getNearbyAppStreamingPolicy().

READ_PHONE_NUMBERS.name: READ_PHONE_NUMBERS
READ_PHONE_NUMBERS.description: Allows read access to the device's phone number(s).
READ_PHONE_NUMBERS.explanation: This is a subset of the capabilities granted by READ_PHONE_STATE but is exposed to instant applications.

READ_PHONE_STATE.name: READ_PHONE_STATE
READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows read only access to phone state, including the current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any PhoneAccounts registered on the device.
READ_PHONE_STATE.explanation: Allows read only access to phone state, including the current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any PhoneAccounts registered on the device.

READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE.name: READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE
READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows read only access to precise phone state.
READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE.explanation: Allows reading of detailed information about phone state for special-use applications such as dialers, carrier applications, or ims applications.

READ_SMS.name: READ_SMS
READ_SMS.description: Allows an application to read SMS messages.

READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows applications to read the sync settings.

READ_SYNC_STATS.name: READ_SYNC_STATS
READ_SYNC_STATS.description: Allows applications to read the sync stats.

READ_VOICEMAIL.name: READ_VOICEMAIL
READ_VOICEMAIL.description: Allows an application to read voicemails in the system.

REBOOT.name: REBOOT
REBOOT.description: Required to be able to reboot the device.

RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED.name: RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED.description: Allows an application to receive the Intent.ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED.explanation: Allows an application to receive the Intent.ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting. If you don't request this permission, you will not receive the broadcast at that time. Though holding this permission does not have any security implications, it can have a negative impact on the user experience by increasing the amount of time it takes the system to start and allowing applications to have themselves running without the user being aware of them. As such, you must explicitly declare your use of this facility to make that visible to the user.

RECEIVE_MMS.name: RECEIVE_MMS
RECEIVE_MMS.description: Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages.

RECEIVE_SMS.name: RECEIVE_SMS
RECEIVE_SMS.description: Allows an application to receive SMS messages.

RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.name: RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.description: Allows an application to receive WAP push messages.

RECORD_AUDIO.name: RECORD_AUDIO
RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows an application to record audio.

REORDER_TASKS.name: REORDER_TASKS
REORDER_TASKS.description: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks.

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING.description: Allows application to request to be associated with a virtual display capable of streaming Android applications (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING) by CompanionDeviceManager.
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING.explanation: Allows application to request to be associated with a virtual display capable of streaming Android applications (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_APP_STREAMING) by CompanionDeviceManager.

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PRO.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PROJECTION
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PRO.description: Allows application to request to be associated with a vehicle head unit capable of automotive projection (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PROJECTION) by CompanionDeviceManager.
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PRO.explanation: Allows application to request to be associated with a vehicle head unit capable of automotive projection (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_AUTOMOTIVE_PROJECTION) by CompanionDeviceManager.

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_COMPUTER.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_COMPUTER
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_COMPUTER.description: Allows application to request to be associated with a computer to share functionality and/or data with other devices, such as notifications, photos and media (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_COMPUTER) by CompanionDeviceManager.
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_COMPUTER.explanation: Allows application to request to be associated with a computer to share functionality and/or data with other devices, such as notifications, photos and media (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_COMPUTER) by CompanionDeviceManager.

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_GLASSES.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_GLASSES
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_GLASSES.description: Allows app to request to be associated with a device via CompanionDeviceManager as "glasses"
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_GLASSES.explanation: Allows app to request to be associated with a device via CompanionDeviceManager as "glasses"

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_STREAMING
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_.description: Allows application to request to stream content from an Android host to a nearby device (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_STREAMING) by CompanionDeviceManager.
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_.explanation: Allows application to request to stream content from an Android host to a nearby device (AssociationRequest.DEVICE_PROFILE_NEARBY_DEVICE_STREAMING) by CompanionDeviceManager.

REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_WATCH.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_WATCH
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_WATCH.description: Allows app to request to be associated with a device via CompanionDeviceManager as a "watch"
REQUEST_COMPANION_PROFILE_WATCH.explanation: Allows app to request to be associated with a device via CompanionDeviceManager as a "watch"

REQUEST_COMPANION_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND
REQUEST_COMPANION_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND.description: Allows a companion app to run in the background.
REQUEST_COMPANION_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND.explanation: This permission implies REQUEST_COMPANION_START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUND, and allows to start a foreground service from the background. If an app does not have to run in the background, but only needs to start a foreground service from the background, consider using REQUEST_COMPANION_START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUND, which is less powerful.

REQUEST_COMPANION_SELF_MANAGED.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_SELF_MANAGED
REQUEST_COMPANION_SELF_MANAGED.description: Allows an application to create a "self-managed" association.

REQUEST_COMPANION_START_FOREGROUND_SERVI.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUND
REQUEST_COMPANION_START_FOREGROUND_SERVI.description: Allows a companion app to start a foreground service from the background.

REQUEST_COMPANION_USE_DATA_IN_BACKGROUND.name: REQUEST_COMPANION_USE_DATA_IN_BACKGROUND
REQUEST_COMPANION_USE_DATA_IN_BACKGROUND.description: Allows a companion app to use data in the background.

REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAGES.name: REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAGES
REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to request deleting packages.
REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAGES.explanation: Apps targeting APIs Build.VERSION_CODES.P or greater must hold this permission in order to use Intent.ACTION_UNINSTALL_PACKAGE or PackageInstaller.uninstall(VersionedPackage, IntentSender).

REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.name: REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS
REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.description: Permission an application must hold in order to use Settings.ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.
REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.explanation: Permission an application must hold in order to use Settings.ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.

REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES.name: REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES
REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to request installing packages.
REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES.explanation: Apps targeting APIs greater than 25 must hold this permission in order to use Intent.ACTION_INSTALL_PACKAGE.

REQUEST_OBSERVE_COMPANION_DEVICE_PRESENC.name: REQUEST_OBSERVE_COMPANION_DEVICE_PRESENCE
REQUEST_OBSERVE_COMPANION_DEVICE_PRESENC.description: Allows an application to subscribe to notifications about the presence status change of their associated companion device

REQUEST_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY.name: REQUEST_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY
REQUEST_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY.description: Allows an application to request the screen lock complexity and prompt users to update the screen lock to a certain complexity level.

RESTART_PACKAGES.name: RESTART_PACKAGES
RESTART_PACKAGES.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 15. The ActivityManager.restartPackage(String) API is no longer supported.

RUN_USER_INITIATED_JOBS.name: RUN_USER_INITIATED_JOBS
RUN_USER_INITIATED_JOBS.description: Allows applications to use the user-initiated jobs API.
RUN_USER_INITIATED_JOBS.explanation: For more details see JobInfo.Builder.setUserInitiated(boolean).

SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM.name: SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM
SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM.description: Allows applications to use exact alarm APIs.

SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE.name: SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE
SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE.description: Allows an application (Phone) to send a request to other applications to handle the respond-via-message action during incoming calls.

SEND_SMS.name: SEND_SMS
SEND_SMS.description: Allows an application to send SMS messages.

SET_ALARM.name: SET_ALARM
SET_ALARM.description: Allows an application to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.

SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.name: SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.description: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.

SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.name: SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.description: Modify the global animation scaling factor.

SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS.name: SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS
SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 15. No longer useful, see PackageManager.addPackageToPreferred(String) for details.

SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.name: SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.description: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.

SET_TIME.name: SET_TIME
SET_TIME.description: Allows applications to set the system time directly.

SET_TIME_ZONE.name: SET_TIME_ZONE
SET_TIME_ZONE.description: Allows applications to set the system time zone directly.

SET_WALLPAPER.name: SET_WALLPAPER
SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper.

SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.name: SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints.

SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES.name: SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES.description: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.

SMS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTIONS.name: SMS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTIONS
SMS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTIONS.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 31. The API that used this permission is no longer functional.

START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUN.name: START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUND
START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUN.description: Allows an application to start foreground services from the background at any time.
START_FOREGROUND_SERVICES_FROM_BACKGROUN.explanation: This permission is not for use by third-party applications, with the only exception being if the app is the default SMS app. Otherwise, it's only usable by privileged apps, app verifier app, and apps with any of the EMERGENCY or SYSTEM GALLERY roles.

START_VIEW_APP_FEATURES.name: START_VIEW_APP_FEATURES
START_VIEW_APP_FEATURES.description: Allows the holder to start the screen with a list of app features.

START_VIEW_PERMISSION_USAGE.name: START_VIEW_PERMISSION_USAGE
START_VIEW_PERMISSION_USAGE.description: Allows the holder to start the permission usage screen for an app.

STATUS_BAR.name: STATUS_BAR
STATUS_BAR.description: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.

SUBSCRIBE_TO_KEYGUARD_LOCKED_STATE.name: SUBSCRIBE_TO_KEYGUARD_LOCKED_STATE
SUBSCRIBE_TO_KEYGUARD_LOCKED_STATE.description: Allows an application to subscribe to keyguard locked (i.e., showing) state.

SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.name: SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an app to create windows using the type WindowManager.LayoutParams.TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY, shown on top of all other apps.
SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.explanation: Allows an app to create windows using the type WindowManager.LayoutParams.TYPE_APPLICATION_OVERLAY, shown on top of all other apps. Very few apps should use this permission; these windows are intended for system-level interaction with the user.

TRANSMIT_IR.name: TRANSMIT_IR
TRANSMIT_IR.description: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available.

TURN_SCREEN_ON.name: TURN_SCREEN_ON
TURN_SCREEN_ON.description: Allows an app to turn on the screen on, e.g.

UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT.name: UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT
UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT.warning: Don't use this permission in your app.This permission is no longer supported.

UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.name: UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.description: Allows an application to update device statistics.

UPDATE_PACKAGES_WITHOUT_USER_ACTION.name: UPDATE_PACKAGES_WITHOUT_USER_ACTION
UPDATE_PACKAGES_WITHOUT_USER_ACTION.description: Allows an application to indicate via PackageInstaller.SessionParams.setRequireUserAction(int) that user action should not be required for an app update.
UPDATE_PACKAGES_WITHOUT_USER_ACTION.explanation: Allows an application to indicate via PackageInstaller.SessionParams.setRequireUserAction(int) that user action should not be required for an app update.

USE_BIOMETRIC.name: USE_BIOMETRIC
USE_BIOMETRIC.description: Allows an app to use device supported biometric modalities.

USE_EXACT_ALARM.name: USE_EXACT_ALARM
USE_EXACT_ALARM.description: Allows apps to use exact alarms just like with SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM but without needing to request this permission from the user.
USE_EXACT_ALARM.explanation: Allows apps to use exact alarms just like with SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM but without needing to request this permission from the user.

USE_FINGERPRINT.name: USE_FINGERPRINT
USE_FINGERPRINT.warning: This constant was deprecated in API level 28. Applications should request USE_BIOMETRIC instead

USE_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT.name: USE_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT
USE_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT.description: Required for apps targeting Build.VERSION_CODES.Q that want to use notification full screen intents.
USE_FULL_SCREEN_INTENT.explanation: Required for apps targeting Build.VERSION_CODES.Q that want to use notification full screen intents.

USE_ICC_AUTH_WITH_DEVICE_IDENTIFIER.name: USE_ICC_AUTH_WITH_DEVICE_IDENTIFIER
USE_ICC_AUTH_WITH_DEVICE_IDENTIFIER.description: Allows to read device identifiers and use ICC based authentication like EAP-AKA.
USE_ICC_AUTH_WITH_DEVICE_IDENTIFIER.explanation: Often required in authentication to access the carrier's server and manage services of the subscriber.

USE_SIP.name: USE_SIP
USE_SIP.description: Allows an application to use SIP service.

UWB_RANGING.name: UWB_RANGING
UWB_RANGING.description: Required to be able to range to devices using ultra-wideband.

WAKE_LOCK.name: WAKE_LOCK
WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming.

WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.name: WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description: Allows applications to write the apn settings and read sensitive fields of an existing apn settings like user and password.

WRITE_CALENDAR.name: WRITE_CALENDAR
WRITE_CALENDAR.description: Allows an application to write the user's calendar data.

WRITE_CALL_LOG.name: WRITE_CALL_LOG
WRITE_CALL_LOG.description: Allows an application to write and read the user's call log data.

WRITE_CONTACTS.name: WRITE_CONTACTS
WRITE_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to write the user's contacts data.

WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.name: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

WRITE_GSERVICES.name: WRITE_GSERVICES
WRITE_GSERVICES.description: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.

WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.name: WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.

WRITE_SETTINGS.name: WRITE_SETTINGS
WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.

WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows applications to write the sync settings.

WRITE_VOICEMAIL.name: WRITE_VOICEMAIL
WRITE_VOICEMAIL.description: Allows an application to modify and remove existing voicemails in the system.
